news.title: Boy, 15, found guilty of murdering fellow pupil
news.summary: Harvey Willgoose, 15, was stabbed at All Saints Catholic High School in Sheffield in February.

news.title: Courts service 'covered up' IT bug that caused evidence to go missing
news.summary: Sources say judges in courts and tribunals will have made rulings when evidence was incomplete.

news.summary: Rupert Lowe says he will donate Â£1,000 to charity but makes "no apologies over being vigilant".

news.title: Boy, 4, dies after being hit by bus as he walked out of hospital
news.summary: The boy, named locally as Zaahir Jan, left the hospital on foot before the crash happened, police say.

news.title: Is Perrier as pure as it claims? The bottled water scandal gripping France
news.summary: Claims that natural mineral water brands are filtering their water have shocked the country.

news.title: Suspected people smuggling arrest after BBC probe
news.summary: Officers say they arrested a 22-year-old Iranian in Acocks Green in Birmingham.

news.title: Mushroom murderer tried to kill husband with pasta, cookies and curry, court was told
news.summary: One alleged attempt left Simon Patterson in a coma, with his family twice told to say their goodbyes.

news.title: Gary Lineker to host new ITV game show The Box
news.summary: It will be his first TV presenting job since leaving Match of the Day in May amid an antisemitism row.

news.title: What we know so far about what Israel wants to do
news.summary: The plan faces fierce opposition within Israel as well as international criticism.

news.title: Taking control means abandoning hostages, families say
news.summary: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's office announced plans to take control of Gaza City on Thursday
